Welcome to Ordinal XAI’s documentation!¶

Ordinal XAI is a Python package for explainable AI in ordinal regression models. It provides various interpretation methods to understand how ordinal regression models make predictions.

    • LOCO (Leave-One-Covariate-Out)

  • Utilities
    • Evaluation Metrics
